venue.address_2: 1.5 miles south of Rt. 130 on Rt. 13
venue.name: Andres Institute of Art

item.description:
Hiking and Sculpture
Sunday Sept 13
1-3 pm
Andres Institute Parking Lot Route 13 Brookline NH
Free.

Hike up Big Bear Mountain in Brookline NH to view some of the 50 thought-provoking original sculptures nestled along walking trails all over the mountain in our 140 acre sculpture park. An art docent will also accompany us to explain the work of these international sculptors. Meet at 1 pm in the parking lot at the Andres Institute Route 13, Brookline NH. Everyone is then invited to join in the Opening of the International Sculpture Symposium from 3-5 pm to meet the institute founders and welcome this year's artists to NH. Refreshments will be served. This is a unique oppportunity.
item.name: Hiking and Sculpture
